description:
Subaru became depressed after losing sight of Minato. She tried to raise the flower remained from the greenhouse, so she joined the Gardening Club in caring for the flower beds. Meanwhile, Aoi worried about Subaru after seeing her like that and started growing frustrated with herself for being unable to do anything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les deux trésors, ou le parfum de la fraise
Takaramono Futatsu Aruiwa Ichigo no Kaori
Two Treasures or the Smell of Strawberries
タカラモノフタツ 或いは イチゴノカオリ
보물 두 개 혹은 딸기 향기
